commit.message:
use C++ for {make,build}_vector_stat

gcc/ChangeLog:

2017-07-28  Trevor Saunders  <tbsaunde+gcc@tbsaunde.org>

	* tree.c (make_vector_stat): Remove _stat from name.
	(build_vector_stat): Likewise.
	* tree.h (make_vector_stat): Remove macro.
	(build_vector_stat): Likewise.

From-SVN: r250705

files.patch:
